thread.title: Rosie O'Donnell Calls Donald Trump 'Mentally Unstable' And A 'Criminal' In An Attempt To 'Stop Him' Before The Inauguration!
thread.title_full: Rosie O'Donnell Calls Donald Trump 'Mentally Unstable' And A 'Criminal' In An Attempt To 'Stop Him' Before The Inauguration!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Rosie O'Donnell Calls Donald Trump 'Mentally Unstable' And A 'Criminal' In An Attempt To 'Stop Him' Before The Inauguration!
text:
Now that it's a new year, the countdown to the apocalypse Donald Trump 's inauguration has begun and Rosie O'Donnell wants to do everything in her power to stop it!
Related: Donald Trump Is STILL Tweeting About The Election! 
Unless you've been living under a rock for the past decade, you know that Donald and Rosie REALLY don't like each other and have absolutely BLASTED each other on more than one occasion !
Well, on Sunday night, the comedienne decided to go after the p*ssy grabbing troll AGAIN to try and "stop him" before he's officially sworn in. We're not sure what the former talk show host is hoping will happen, but regardless, she's doing her damnedest by sharing several articles slamming the future POTUS -- while also calling him "mentally unstable" and a "criminal"!
The 54-year-old took to Twitter to share: 
TRUMP IS A CRIMINAL - https://t.co/dkhfSr4Ubc 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 1, 2017 
DONALD TRUMP IS MENTALLY UNSTABLE - https://t.co/6AvhoPq1du 
LESS THAN 3 WEEKS TO STOP HIM AMERICA
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 1, 2017 
Miz O'Donnell then spent some time retweeting fans tweets about Mr. Trump before sharing:
DT IS MENTALLY ILL - https://t.co/BteaQgsUxJ via @kassyapple #RESIST #FOCUS 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 2, 2017 
The funny lady also made sure to educate people who SOMEHOW couldn't find any examples of the President elect being racist:
@kpetrey41 @Rosie Not hard to find examples with a simple online search.... https://t.co/hhT4MbtjOx 
— Just Truly (@JustTrulySo) January 2, 2017 
The actress then continued to share some articles and respond to others' tweets:
impeach Trump begins now. https://t.co/iUCkewYTPI via @HuffPostPol 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 2, 2017 
pathetic https://t.co/SOjTFG3tna 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 2, 2017 
Donald Trump unfit to be president: https://t.co/GiXDu6InGj via @slate 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 2, 2017 
https://t.co/bXKITOb0IJ 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 2, 2017 
seriously - this guy is gonna lead the free world https://t.co/nJbm3r6zbX 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 3, 2017 
IT AINT JUST ME - https://t.co/nhW5Cexmm3 @PinkNews @realDonaldTrump 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 3, 2017 
i am not running - not serving the people - upholding the constitution - HE IS A CON MAN - USE GOOGLE GARY @GaryYou83040195 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 3, 2017 
we need to see his taxes ... https://t.co/rNm3GNZYt2 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 3, 2017 
After all that, Rosie threw one more jab in about the former Celebrity Apprentice star having NO money as she shared:
More evidence than ever that Donald Trump is flat broke https://t.co/cGHm6LHku4 via @PalmerReport 
— ROSIE (@Rosie) January 3, 2017 
Sadly, Donald hasn't responded, but it's certainly still GREAT to raise awareness about how Crazytown Bananapants Donald really is!
What are your thought on Rosie continuing to trash our future Prez?
[ Image via CBS /Joseph Marzullo/ WENN . ]
